analyzed: śākyasiṃhastotram
nava graha kṛtam
praṇamāmi jinam sugatam satatam tapanīya hiraṇya śarīra chavim
vara cakra vibhūṣita pāṇitalam sa sura asura mānuṣa pāpa haram
praṇamāmi muni indra gurum lalitam satata ākula nirjita māra balam
daśa pāramitā pratibodha karam sukaram
praṇamāmi hitaṅkara deva naram sa nara amara pūjita deva varam
praṇamāmi sukha ākara bodhi bharam sva sukham pradadau karuṇā āśayataḥ
para duḥkham a sahya cakāra januḥ gata doṣa nirākula śākya kule

original: praṇamāmi ca lokahitāya gṛhaṃ vijahau pitaraṃ ramaṇīsahitam |
analyzed: praṇamāmi ca loka hitāya gṛham vijahau pitaram ramaṇī sahitam
haya kaṇṭhaka chandaka deva vṛtaḥ muditaḥ abhyagamat suvane vijane

original: praṇamāmi tapovanasubhramitaṃ pracakāra ca yastu maharṣigaṇān |
analyzed: praṇamāmi tapaḥ vana su bhramitam pracakāra ca yaḥ tu mahā ṛṣi gaṇān
catur āryaka brahmavihāra parān sugata smaraṇa eka tapaḥ vratikān
praṇamāmi mahā druma mūla vare su tṛṇāsana saṃśrita vajra dharam
śata koṭi sumāra bala astra haram śata saṃkhya tathāgata putra vṛtam

original: praṇamāmi ca mallikapañcaśatā vaṇijaḥ pratipālanameva kṛtāḥ |
analyzed: praṇamāmi ca mallika pañcaśatāḥ vaṇijaḥ pratipālanam eva kṛtāḥ
vaṇija arpita pañca sudhā nayakam śubha pāyasa bhojana bhakṣa kṛtam
praṇamāmi su vartita dharma varam mṛgadāva vane caturāsanake
vidhi śakra sura asura loka vṛtam su śarīra mahā ujjvala sarva diśam

original: gurunirmitakaṃ sugatastavakaṃ paṭhanaṃ kurute kila yo manujaḥ |
analyzed: guru nirmitakam sugata stavakam paṭhanam kurute kila yaḥ manujaḥ

original: graharogabhayaṃ nahi tasya sadā sa tu yāsyati mokṣapure supure || 10 ||
analyzed: graha roga bhayam na hi tasya sadā sa tu yāsyati mokṣa pure su pure
āditya ādi nava graha kṛtam śrī śākyasiṃha stotram samāptam
